content:
Yeah, I did step out onto the Ledge, and it was exhilarating! The views of the city from up there were incredible. If I had more time, I would've loved to explore more of Millennium Park and check out the "Cloud Gate" sculpture, also known as "The Bean". I've heard it's really cool.

And yes, I did try some deep-dish pizza! A colleague recommended a place called Lou Malnati's, and it did not disappoint. The thick crust and flavorful fillings were amazing. I can see why it's a Chicago staple.

What about some recommendations for things to do in Asheville, North Carolina? I'm considering a road trip there soon.
